Summary Heading: I noticed two issues (not really complaints) that I would...
Summary: I noticed two issues (not really complaints) that I would like to share. It was obviously a busy day and he used it for at least an hour.   Couldn't the hotel afford something else to transport supplies around the property?  My second issue has to do with the perpetual cluster of employees and laundry carts at the stairway and elevator.  I understand the need for a staging area....but somehow it could be arranged so it doesn't dominate the sidewalk around high traffic areas.

I had to make a few trips to get my cards re-coded till I got the hang of it. Also, the Wi-Fi in some of the rooms is spotty at best. However, overall I was very happy and I would stay there again.

Summary: Stayed here for a recent work trip in the area. It is adequate. I appreciated the large sink area to get ready, but the lighting in the entire room and especially near that area was awful. The hotel felt safe enough but there was a room on the end that had it's door open and EMS and police there.  There looked to be a pool but it was in the middle of the parking lot.  I wouldn't intentionally come back to this hotel in the future, only booked because it was the best deal I could find in a short time period. One plus was the parking was free.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do NOT stay at the Ramada Costa Mesa/Newport Beach
Summary: We stayed at the Ramada Costa Mesa over the July 4 weekend.  We asked for a quiet room.   We were not warned that the Ramada Costa Mesa has all-night parties throughout the July 4 weekend - every year.   The noise from the college-student parties made it difficult/impossible to get any sleep.  Calls to the motel manager promised to get the noise down, but had no lasting effect.   At the check-out the Manager told us we should have known that the motel was going to be a party-base, since it has been so every year.  We came in from the east coast to attend a family wedding.   We had no idea there would be such a problem; and thought it only reasonable that the Ramada staff should have warned us at check-in, especially since we asked for a quiet room.  I will never stay in a Ramada

Room did appear nice,

Summary Heading: We have stayed here many times over the years, always...
Summary: We have stayed here many times over the years, always finding the rooms clean and a good value.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and positive words. On your next stay be sure to ask about our returning guest discount for an even greater value. We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: The room next to the Laundary
Summary: I was woke up early every morning to people talking and machines going. The staff hang out all day long in front of the door talking loud of the machines.
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the unfortunate experience you had at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. Our main priority is the comfort of all our guests. If you do decide to return with us, I am sure we will be up to your standards. Thank you for your time.

Summary Heading: Easy to find and not to far from other places to visit; Beach, Disney, Parks. etc.
Summary: Hotel is an older model with not any extras.  There was only one reg cup of coffee offered.  House keeping only left us one towel, maid seemed mad that she could not clean our room - we just wanted fresh towels and took out our own trash.  Restaurant menu looked good but the old odor was to much and we could not eat there.  The beds were nice but the pillows should be replaced as they have been washed to many times.  Probably time to replace the carpet.  Not to bad of a place but not the Hilton, price was high but low for the area.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment and revisit the meaning of hospitality and excellent customer service with the staff. Our housekeepers leave one regular coffee and decaf, but upon request we do send up extras if needed. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: This is a no fuss place to stay  easy parking clean basic rooms. Refrigerator and microwave. Restaurant and bar on the premises. $5.00 Uber ride to restaurants on Pacific Coast highway. Pool too. Close to everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us such a positive and informative review. On your next stay, I am sure we will exceed your expectations. We appreciate your patronage and hope to see you soon.

Summary: We had two rooms, one with two beds and one Suite. The rooms were beautiful, clean and bright. The beds were comfortable! The front desk, especially Michael were great with their Hospitality skills.  The location was perfect, great near by restaurants and the beaches were close and easy to get to.  The GM, Ross Stibor was extremely gracious and wanted to make sure that myself and my friends were well taken care of.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words. We at the Ramada take great pride in the excellent customer service provided to all of our guests. I am sure I speak on behalf of the employees mentioned when I say that we enjoyed having you here and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Considering the pricing is average for the area, it could still use a little more attention to detail. Early in the morning, housekeeping knocked on doors loudly and they were loud in the hallways. I understand they need to clean rooms ASAP, however 8 am is not acceptable. This was how we woke up on a weekend after a long day.   Parking was easily accessed and plentiful. There is a coffee maker in the room, enough for 2 cups.
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the unfortunate experience you had at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. Our priority is the comfort of all of our guests. Although I cannot change what happened, I do hope you will consider us in the future.

Summary Heading: Good location, clean and comfortable hotel
Summary: Good location, clean and comfortable. Mattress was new; tags were still on bed. Only problem, 2nd day replenishment of coffee and shampoo didn't occur.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your getaway location, and for taking the time to leave us an informative review. Although I cannot change the past, I am confident that upon your next visit we can not only meet your expectations, but surpass them. We look forward to your return.

Summary: The room met our needs as we were only there to attend an event with-in the area and this was the recommended hotel. Nothing special. The biggest downfall was the smell. The cleaning products used left the overpowering disgusting smell of a cheap motel.  I would not stay here again for that reason.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Ramada. My sincerest apologies  for the issue that occurred. What you experienced is not representative of the outstanding service and product we provide regularly. If given another chance, I am confident we can surpass your expectations.

Summary Heading: My ride was late to the airport, so I called and they sent...
Summary: My ride was late to the airport, so I called and they sent the shuttle - Excellent customer service!!! Room was clean, beds were comfortable and hotel was quiet. staff was always friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a pleasant review. All of the employees at the Ramada go to great lengths to insure all of our guests full satisfaction. On your next stay be sure to let us know about your last pleasant one to receive our special returning guest gift!

Summary: Just as I fell asleep the alarm clock in the room next door started beeping at midnight and continued for almost an hour. I called the front desk to report the relentless noise and the guy said there was someone checked into the room so they couldnt go in and shut it. They didn't offer me another room or any solution. I had to insist on switich rooms, and the alarm was still beeping as I  pack up all my stuff at 1 am. They reluctantly gave me a different room that smelled like urine. I was grossed out and exhausted. This was the only room they supposedly had available.  I asked the guy at the desk if those alarm clocks ever stop and he said no. I mentioned that they are out of date and most people can just use their phones. Does there really need to be alarm CLOCKS in every room
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment and revisit the meaning of hospitality and excellent customer service with the staff. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: The room could have been cleaner, the cover placed at the foot of each bed wasn't clean, had spots on it.   I had to wipe the fixtures on the sink. bathroom area spelled of mildew which made it difficult for me to sleep.  Initial check in wasn't as customer friendly as I had wanted.  We arrived early to the hotel and was told no room was available and to come back in a few hours.  there was two rooms available but couldn't accommodate us.  We drove 7 hours from the san Francisco bay area and was exhausted but complied with the receptionist suggestion.  When we returned we were told the room still wasn't available and we would need to wait a few more hours.  we decided to sit in the lobby area.  while waiting a gentleman/customer approached the receptionist and who also arrived
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies for the inconvenience you had during your stay. I will be sure to take this opportunity to talk to my housekeeping and front desk department and assure these issues do not persist. Thank you for the feedback, and please know your business is very important to us.

Summary: When we checked into our room at 11 pm the door was open. I called front desk and they didn't seem concerned.  There was a big tear on skirt of bed. Paper thin walls  I called front desk to ask for xtra blankets but was told I have to pick them up. Well it was 1230 am I didn't feel safe walking outside. Paper thin walls. When we checked in there was a customer who was drunk and bothering the employees.  I advice the clerk there was a beer can placed by front office window. When we returned from getting a late dinner beer can was still on window sill.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel experience.We've spent 3 nights there,excellent location,near beautiful beaches,walking distance to stores and restaurants..Just,food at hotel buffet is at average prices,and they dont have free breakfast..Everything else is excellent,
Manager Response: We at the Ramada take great pride when our guests tell us about their wonderful stays. I am sure I speak for the entire staff when I say that we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Wonderful staff. Always available. Great place to stay if you are here for a short visit. The area is a little "in transition" for lack of a better term. It is convenient, plenty of parking, staff is excellent.. Would recommend. Close to good restaurants, affordable, convenient what you you need.  If you are in town for an event like a graduation or wedding, perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your greatly informative review, it is much appreciated. On your next stay be sure to mention your past stay to get our returning guest discount.

Summary: I was in town for business. The stay was great and the hotel was within a mile of my destination. The food in the restaurant did not meet my expectations though.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. My apologies the food in our restaurant did not meet your expectations. I do hope if you stay with us again you can give our restaurant another chance. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: I stayed here for my daughter's wedding and was a bit disappointed with the room they called a suite. A bit small even for two people. The pull out bed could have had a better mattress.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us and for taking the time to leave us a review. My sincerest apologies for any inconveniences the size of the room may have caused. I do hope you will decide to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Hard to sleep with pipe or other mechanical system noise throughout night.  Sounded like someone bouncing a small superball on the floor above.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about us. Let me start off by apologizing for the inconvenience that occurred during your stay at our location. Our property is constantly switching out older items with newer ones to insure our guests are fully satisfied. Thank you for you feedback, it will be brought up to our management team so that we may continue to improve our property.

Summary: Had requested a roll-away and was told they were out. Then got to the room, A/C was broken. Switched rooms and same issue. This hotel needs some major renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. I do hope you will consider us in the future as this experience was not representative of the outstanding experiences we provide regularly.

Summary: Old and outdated. Internet was slow and kicked you off a lot. Staff was not to excited to be there but did manage to get the key in my hand.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment and revisit the meaning of "hospitality" with the staff. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently.

Summary: I believe the Ramada is the  best value for the money in Newport Beach, very convenient to everything in Newport and Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and helpful feedback. We at the Ramada strive to provide the best quality service and products to all of our valued guests. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next stay with us.

Summary: Love this place! I have stayed here many times. It's nice, clean, close to the beach, shopping and stores. Best price for your money. Great friendly staff, cute little restaurant on premises with outdoor dining. Pretty basic, but awesome!
Manager Response: We at the Ramada take great pride in providing a clean and inviting atmosphere to all who are on our property. Your kind words will help our staff strive to reach the highest level of guest satisfaction. Guest feedback is always greatly appreciated.

Summary: As a "veteran" traveler, my personal experience with this property rivals that of other hospitality properties that cost many times more.  I highly recommend this hotelier.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to be able to serve someone who served our country. We enjoy hearing how all of guests enjoyed staying with us. If you do decide to return, mention your last visit with us for our returning guest discount. Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review.

Summary Heading: Great price, great people, and lovely location!
Summary: We had a wonderful time at the Ramada Costa Mesa/Newport Beach.  The hotel personnel were very courteous and helpful.  The room was clean and comfortable. Our only problem was the temperature of the hot tub.  Slightly warm, but definitely not hot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, guests feedback is always greatly appreciated. Our sincerest apologies for the issues with the hot tub. We have been doing some maintenance in our pool area, so I am glad to inform you that the maintenance as well as the temperature should be back up to standard. Thank you again and know that your feedback is always welcome.

Summary: From the front desk service to the cleanliness of the room this was a great place to stay in a great area. It looked like the property was recently renovated, and it looked new. You can't beat the price and the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful words. I will pass them on to our staff so that they can continue to take pride in what they do on a daily basis. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel as part of a group for a destination wedding. The place was great, the location was nice. Walking distance to a lot of restaurants, etc.
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to hear such kind words. We sincerely hope you enjoyed the wedding you attended, and wish you nothing but the best. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: My brother & his partner reserved a large block of rooms for his wedding weekend.  I booked a room on-line, only to find out from my brother that was the room he was supposed to have. They forgot to reserve this room for him.  I called the Ramada to fix it, but was told my reservation didn't come up.  When they looked at the room I had booked, it was listed under my brother's name.  I no longer had a room reservation & I asked the girl out right if I came the weekend of the wedding, did I have a room & she said "NO". So, they moved my room and never contacted me or set me back up.  I went ahead and reserved a new room for the weekend.  I was quoted a price of $92.+ for the room.  I called the night before my stay to confirm my room and the roll away bed and was told I was good.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience here. I assure you that what you experienced is not representative of the outstanding service we provide regularly. I do hope you give us a chance in the future to provide a true Ramada Inn experience.

Summary: House tented. Stayed at Ramada  with our cat & dog great stay a little noise one night ,college group traveling thur . Other than that clean , staff very helpful. Resturant on site. $ amount so so. Near Del Taco &  markets
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us such a positive and informative review. We appreciate your patronage and hope to see you soon.

Summary: Bed never made and throw was tossed behind TV. Mold in the shower. Over charged my CC and didn't leave any towels
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An embarrassment to the Ramada chain hotels
Summary: The room has poor insulation, we can hear nouse from outside. The AC didn't work. We checked in late but there were still cleaning rags left in the room, as if the cleaning lady was in a hurry to clean it.  Trash cans were places in sink counter and dining table. Personally, i don't put and trash can on my dining table, you know how gross it is? For the price we paid, no breakfast? In the past, we always regard Ramada hotels as high quality, but I guess Ramada didnt keep up to their name.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment with the staff. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: Hot tub did not work, bugs in the bathroom, heat/AC did not work. Sent someone in to fix it and broke again the next day, beds were horrible. Wanted to speak to a manager but no one was available.. Overall not happy with our stay
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Thank you for the feedback, your comments will be reviewed with the team so we can improve.

Summary: I'm a teen, I went for spring break, they are really stict, even knowing that it's spring break.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an informative review. In the past our hotel has been seen as a fun area for younger crowds, and while we want our guests to come and enjoy their time with us to the fullest extent, we also wanted the families staying with us to enjoy it and be comfortable. Your positive review means we succeeded in doing just that. We look forward to hosting you and all the other spring breakers in the future.

Summary: It is what it is, it's a 3 star hotel. Good location as far a stores close by and restaurants. The bright side is you don't have to pay for parking. I stayed here because all the hotels close to Disneyland was overpriced because of spring break. Its approximately 20 minutes from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time and your kind words. We look forward to welcoming you back; remember to remind us you are a returning guest for a nice discount for your loyalty.

Summary: The hotel looks ok from the outside but the room needs all kinds of work. Nice location and close to everything but I wouldn't pay full price for this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. While we are always looking to update our older items throughout the year, we are also in the process of replacing most of the furniture in our rooms.  I do hope that in the future you give us another chance and enjoy the progression of the improvements to the property.

Summary: Checked in on March 18th for a 3 days stay.  Rooms are dirty and the furniture is used and the fabrics are falling apart. This is not a "Non smoking" hotel and the statement on the website is false advertisement. Rooms are sprayed with chemicals to cover the cigarette's smell. If you try to open the window, it will open to the hallways where everybody smokes and drinks 24/7! AAA discount or any discounted rate they advertise is simply ignored and you will be charged in full. Be ready to hear " We are sold out" each time you speak to the front desk agents.  This place is a nightmare. Stay away.
Manager Response: none

Summary: room next to laundry where I had to listen to machines all night and then at 6am.  housekeeping lined up all their  carts in front of our room and were so loud!  Rooms are outdated and nothing special.
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies for your negative occurrences during your stay. I am a bit concerned as far as the times you mentioned. Our laundry room ceases all operations at 11pm and opens back up at 8am. I will be sure to speak to my Housekeeping Supervisor to insure that the aforementioned times are being followed. Thank you for your time and helpful words.

Summary: We stayed here for one night. The location is "in between", not really close to anything. The room carpet was one of the dirtiest I've experienced, I happened to walk barefoot on it and my feet were actually grey after that!  Other than that it was an average motel room. We used the laundry room which worked fine.   This is a budget option for Newport Beach, though I would try another place if I were to go back.
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the unfortunate experience you had at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. Our main priority is the comfort of all our guests. Our housekeeping department takes time out of every day to deep clean rooms, including carpet shampooing. If you do decide to return with us, I am sure we will be up to your standards.

Summary Heading: A few items not in good shape
Summary: Location is very good but our room was not in good shape.  The tub faucet dripped all night, the sink was stopped up and the bed frame was broken or out of "wack" since the bottom part of our king size mattress was dipping toward the center.  We did not return to our room until late in the evening and was too late to call these troubles, or even have another room available, so we were stuck in this room for the evening.
Manager Response: I am very sorry to hear of your experience. We are constantly updating and refreshing our rooms. Unfortunately renovations occur in phases at a property this size, and while many spaces have been addressed, we are still working to complete room refresh. I do hope you give us another chance and experience the continuous improvements we are making.

Summary: I will not go back. I was disappointed in my recent stay at Ramada Costa Mesa. The problem is the fact that this is an old property - you hear everything and anything that goes on thus your sleep is constantly interrupted. Additionally, there are people hanging out smoking and drinking and throwing their ash and cigarettes down on the cars below. It seemed that some of these people have made Ramada a permanent residence considering their comfort level.  I do not recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: I apologize for any inconveniences experienced during your stay. As an older property we do our best to keep the property looking as new and up to date as possible. While we are in the process of remodeling, with a property our size, it takes time as it must be done in sections at a time. As far as guests who smoke, our managers walk the property at all hours of the day and inform guests of our designated smoking areas. If given another opportunity, I am confident we can change your mind.

Summary Heading: Great location for Follow-up Exam @ Hoag Hospital
Summary: Perfect location for overnight stay of out-of-town people when re-visiting Hoag Hospital. Staff at Ramada Inn are very accommodating in ensuring guests are comfortable and cost is very reasonable. They also provide a variation of room styles.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing the things that made your experience a pleasant one. We look forward to your return

Summary: This place is nothing more than okay. And it's a motel, not a hotel. I was expecting it to be a 5 Star hotel, but I was expecting a bit more than I experience. The location is awesome, right down the street from Newport Beach. Definitely not walking distance, but a short drive. The staff was really nice and helpful. Our air conditioning was broken the entire time of our stay, the room was overall good besides the a/c problem. I felt overall safe at the hotel. Overall I had an okay experience, I wasn't overly happy but I was decently satisfied. Probably wouldn't stay again.
Manager Response: I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. It is unfortunate that due to the A/C not working your stay with us was less that what you expected. Our maintenance staff works around the clock to insure all amenities in the room work to their full capacity. If given another chance, I am sure we can get you to see why many others choose us as their go-to place for rest and relaxation. Thank you and have a wonderful day.

Summary: Stayed one night for a wedding this past Saturday and couldn't have had a better experience!  I had planned on crashing in someone else's room that night and on the way up wanted to see what they had available. There were only a few rooms left but I was able to book it right away and they even gave me a discount on the room since it was for the wedding even though the discount time period ended over a month ago.  After a great night out, (which was super convenient because we were drinking and taking Ubers all over and even with Ubers late night surcharging the rates were all super cheap. This is a great location!!!) On the way home after checking out, I realized I had lost my wallet!!!! I called and after some searching they found it but I was back home almost 2 hrs away.  I
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to receive such kind words. As the General Manager of the property, Ross personally does what he can to assure every guests leaves 100% satisfied. Our entire staff, including management, take great pride in providing excellent customer service. Be sure to mention your last stay upon your next visit for another pleasant discount for our returning guests!

Summary: I am a Wyndham timeshare owner. We stayed at this property which was s little lack luster. It was clean, and had plenty of room. The bed was comfortable enough and the noise level was quiet.  However, some things just can bring an experience down. There should be a designated smoking area. Nothing beats walking out in the morning and seeing your neighbors all lined up in front of the units smoking- one with his shirt off.  The toilet was positioned in room 148, so close to the wall it was difficult to sit down, not to mention the metal double toilet paper holder right in the way of being seated. To top it off the toilet seats crooked so you are at s slant tilted towards the wall which is already in your shoulder.  The safe had no power and wasn't working . The wall paper was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. Our maintenance and housekeeping staff work diligently to make sure our guests are put into a room that not only meets expectations, but surpasses them. My apologies that you and your family experienced any less than what you expected. Your business is very important to us, if given another chance I am sure you will be pleasantly surprised.

Summary: While my room was decent, I did hear a few of my friends complain that their rooms weren't very clean. I will agree that shampooing or even replacing the carpet would be ideal. If I wanted to wear black socks, I would have brought some. Dirty floors.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your go to hotel. We at the Ramada are constantly shampooing our rooms, while also taking precautions on replacing the carpet as they age and whither away. My sincerest apologies for the negative experience, but after talking with my housekeeping department and doubling our efforts to provide only the best quality rooms, I am sure on your next stay we will meet your expectations.

Summary: We were able to check-in early upon arrival which  was nice for us to settle in and get ready early for the wedding we were attending close by.  The beds were comfy and the room is spacious.  I would definitely recommend staying at the Ramada hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review. I'm sure i speak for all the staff at the Ramada when I say that it was our pleasure.We have plenty of wedding parties staying with us and we understand that sometimes getting into the room as early as possible can make all the difference. Although we cannot always accommodate early check-ins, we definitely try our best to make it possible. We at the Ramada hope you and your family and friends enjoyed the wedding.

Summary: We always try to stay at this Ramada went we plan a trip to Newport Beach. It's close enough, but more reasonably priced being in Costa Mesa. Only drawback is no free breakfast offered (there is a resturant on site) and lately the cost has gone up , otherwise 5* for sure ...
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and kind words. We here at the Ramada always appreciate it when people acknowledge our fair and competitive prices. Be sure to ask for the returning guest rate and I am sure you will be pleasantly surprised with how much you save.

Summary: Room was average at best, but the beds were terrible unless you like to sleep in the middle of the bed as no matter what you did, the bed sloped to the middle.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we appreciate all words of advice and take them to heart. Here on our property we are constantly replacing old furniture, including the beds, and purchasing new items. Although I cannot change what has happened, upon your next stay I can assure you will be well taken care of.

Summary Heading: Needs better trained front desk staff
Summary: Over all, the room was what I would expect. Clean, up to code, and hot water. My displeasure was with the front office staff. They pre authorized the card on file WITHOUT telling me before my arrival, then failed to release the Authorization when I provided a second card at check in. The manager was standing right there and failed to acknowledge this point at check in. They neither informed me of hotel specific information at check in, either. I work for a hotel and all of these points are trained within the first week of training at my property. Make sure you inquire about if they pre authorized your card or you'll have to wait a week to get your money back on a double charge.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The bed was good and the room clean.  Aspects of the room were in disrepair, such as molding torn away from the base of the wall, etc.  Wireless internet connection was so slow it wasn't worth the effort.  Staff was very friendly and helpful, although it appeared that there is no bell to signal staff when someone is at the front desk.  I had to wait awhile at the front desk a few times, saying "Hello?"  loudly until someone eventually came out from the office. These are not major things, they are just small details that make the difference between an average stay and a great one.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave an informative review. Our maintenance staff is constantly working in our rooms to assure issues inside the rooms are prevented. We will use this as a learning experience to assure this issue is a thing of the past.

Summary Heading: Stained bed linens a big turn-off
Summary: When I arrived, the first thing I noticed was that the burgundy-colored bed runner - the useless piece of decorative cloth at the foot of the bed - was heavily stained.  There were visible stains all over it.  I took it directly to the front desk to get it out of my room.  There were no apologies, they just took it from me.  Later, when I was going to bed and turned down the covers, I saw a large stain on the bottom sheet, right near my pillow.  It was too late to do anything about changing it, so I just covered the entire area with a bath towel.  Very much below standards.
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies that you had such a negative stay at our hotel. We take pride in always assuring that our guests receive the very best customer service and the cleanest rooms. We take it very seriously the fact that we did nothing to amend this issue. If given another chance, I'm sure you will see a significant difference.

Summary: Geografis very good. Clean property with service minded staff. Bad internet and to much party people at the weekends.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as your destination getaway. Our property is always looking for ways to make the guests feel welcome and well taken care of. As for our internet, we are in the process of speeding it up to insure our guests 100% satisfaction. On your next stay I am confident you will be pleasantly surprised.

Summary Heading: Close to the beach and many good restaurants
Summary: I enjoyed our stay and swimming in the pool every day. The rooms are clean but could do with some upgrades. Staff is pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review, and for choosing us as your place to stay. Our hotel is always looking at new ways to constantly exceed hotel expectations, and a full in room upgrade is in the works. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Clean, decent rates, good location, buuuut...
Summary: We arrived and checked in, on our way to the room we passed our neighbors who seemed to be burning a forrest of pot.  We left and came back later in the evening and the forrest was much larger.  The smell was coming into the room and really bothering my son.  He went to complain and the person at the front desk was unwilling to do anything about it except move us.  So, here we are, moving our stuff at 11:30 at night because they let people light up in their non-smoking room.  Even worse, half of the new room's lights didn't work.  Beyond the glaring issues, the rooms were clean and the location of the hotel was perfect for us.  It had free WiFi, even though it was almost unusable.  There seemed to be ample parking.  But, I'm not sure that I'd give it another chance after that.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. I do hope you will consider us in the future as this experience was not representative of the outstanding experiences we provide regularly.

Summary: Was working a business trip and needed close proximity to SNA airport as well as convention in Huntington Beach.  Great bed & showers.  Pillows could have been improved but it was very comfortable and handy & well priced for the area.  We only ate once at their restaurant which was a little overpriced and service not so good. (Never asked if we wanted refills. Will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a great and informative review. We at the Ramada pride ourselves in providing quality rooms for our guests with excellent customer service to boot. On your next stay I am confident we will exceed your expectations.

Summary: great motel...nice heated spa after long day  large pool and walk to dennys and other local shops and pizza place has  good pizza or they del to room.... I have stayed at this motel for years...great motel for the money close to Newport beach and costa mesa ...Irvine and hunting beach...
Manager Response: Your kind words are much appreciated and very helpful, although I must correct you in saying we are a hotel not a motel. Nevertheless, it is always a pleasure having guests such as yourself. We look forward to being your relaxing getaway once again.

Summary: The rooms are wonderful and clean. The location is convenient and central. The issue that I have is there were people loitering both in the parking lot and in front of the rooms. This made me nervous enough to bring my valuables with me. I hope that this can be remedied because this property is very nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such kind words. Our management team is constantly walking the property, including the parking lot, to insure nothing that would endanger our guests or their belongings happen. On your next stay, I am confident you will feel far more comfortable and secure.

Summary: We had a great stay here and it was close to many great shops, restaurants and the beach! We were able to extend our stay fairly hassle free.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Ramada, it is always a pleasure to hear kind words from any of our guests. We here at the Ramada relish the idea of guests deciding to stay longer with us, thus the simple extension process. Next stay be sure to ask about our returning guest rate, I'm sure you will be pleasantly surprised.

Summary: Loved my pet friendly suite, clean and well maintained. Customer service provided by Kristine and Barbara were amazing!!!!! The food was great and fairly priced. Conveniently close to the Triangle Square  Would definitely stay here again!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a very informative and awesome review! I'm sure I speak on behalf of the entire property when I say what a pleasure it is to hear kind words from any of our guests.We look forward to being your future getaway again!

Summary: Descent hotel for overnight stay, but a lot of people smoke right outside the room and the A/C just blows the smoke in. Wish they setup a smoking area away from the rooms. Here are the pros and cons. Pros: Good location, near all the shops and beach. Large room. Everything works. (Remote, TV, locks, and etc.) Room service cleaned up the room very well every night. Easy parking. Bed is comfortable. Cons: Front desk wasn't very helpful or smiles much. (Didn't accept my reward #, entered some strange # that I didn't recognize.) Rooms old and sofa had stain and chair creeked. Smelled smoke both in the evening and morning when entering or leaving room. (The smoke gets piped in through A/C sometimes.) Didn't provide lotion unless asked for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the honest and informative review. We here at the Ramada are always walking the property to assure that people smoking are are told they must go to the designated are. I will make sure to double our effort to assure that this issue does not persist in the future. If you do decide to stay with us in the future, I am confident you will see significant improvement.

Summary: I prefer a hotel where the doors are not accessible from the outside.  Other than that, it was great.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing the Ramada as your place to stay, and for the great review. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Does not add up to 3 stars
Summary: Bed was comfortable and got low rate $45 on hotwire, good location. but nothing else positive to say. Rooms are 2 star at best. Wifi was in and out. Low budget weekly type guests going on here. Lots of commercial trucks in lot. Keys worked a few times then i had to go to the desk and get new ones. Man at check in was just going through the motions, No care or attempt to be friendly, No info given. It was as if i was a bother to him to check in. I checked in Jan 6th 2016 about 8pm in case management reads these. The rooms simply need to be remodeled the towels are terrible and the bathroom was not to clean. Management can respond to this with the typical spin but reality is that no matter what they would say they simply choose to put to many dollars into their pockets and to few
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies for your negative occurrences during your stay. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service we provide on a regular basis. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. We will do everything we can to assure that these issues are a thing of the past. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary Heading: A nice, clean place which is close to beach.
Summary: I have stayed 2 times at the Costa Messa Ramada, and I wasn't disappointed this time. Rooms are clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: We here at the Ramada are always looking for ways to exceed all guest expectations. On your next stay I am confident that we will do just that and earn your 5 star satisfaction. Thank you for taking the time to leave a great review, we look forward to stay number 3.

Summary: I've stayed here a couple times now.  Although the bed was a little firm for me, it's still a very comfortable bed.  The room was clean and great for my family.  It's just a short drive to the ocean.  I would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your taking the time to leave an awesome review and for choosing the Ramada for your family get-away. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to our hotel.

Summary: The hotel it self was fine, clean room, nice place  But paying $35 for parking 2 days, Really Stupid  Had I known I would have cancelled this reservation
Manager Response: Dear Mr Daniel L,  I'm not sure who's bill your looking at but we do not charge for parking.  Please call me Ross S and if somehow you have a parking charge I will refund it.  We do not charge for parking.  I apologize for any inconvience

Summary: The room smelled like pine sol so strongly that it made us sick. The shower was disappointing, the bed was shaped like a U and was uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I apologize for the inconvenience you had during your stay, I will be sure to take this opportunity to talk to my housekeeping department and assure this issue does not persist. If you decide to stay with us again I am confident that you will be pleasantly surprised.

Summary: 3 night stay to be with children and grandchildren.  It was wonderful to have a place to come back to after a full day with family.  Our own space to relax and recoup for another day full of activity.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review. We appreciate you staying with us and look forward to being your oasis of rest and relaxation in the future.

Summary: I have never felt being squashed between two rooms where everything is going on that I didnt want to hear. I almost called the police for one of the rooms and the other was a meeting place for the night. My wife and I were so upset about the whole reservation, and were caught. I checked out the next morning and relayed my problem. What I was told was sorry, and found out the police did come to the Ramada, but down further from us to another problem. What they need there is a security guard at night for the disturbances. This type of thing has happened before, but never this intense. Someone needs to fix this problem as my wife would not let me go outside or leave her.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service we provide on a regular basis. Our management team is constantly walking the property making sure issues like this don't present themselves, I will personally make sure to redouble our efforts to insure any issues are taken care of before they present themselves. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: All in all this was what I would expect from a property of this nature. Rooms and bathroom were clean, all amenities were present and functional. All staff encounters were pleasant.   The only thing missing was a comforter or extra blanket. Two sheets and a blanket in between is not sufficient bed coverings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive and informative review. We at the Ramada strive to provide the best rooms and customer service imaginable. Normally we put extra blankets and pillows in the TV stand drawers, but our staff is always available to provide any missing or extra items needed in the room. We look forward to your return.

Summary: King suite was very spacious, clean and comfortable.  My wife and I stayed here one night for a company Christmas party.  At check-in, my reservation could not be found, but they fit us into a room.  Room was clean, and quiet.  Appeared that the mattress was new, and very comfortable.  We got a great night sleep.  Had breakfast at the on sight restaraunt and it was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review. On your next stay I‚Äôm confident we will exceed your expectations.

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel at least 3 times this year.  It is an older place and a bit run down, however, the location and staff are wonderful.  The cost to stay here is generally inexpensive.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an informative review. Our hotel will actually be going through some pretty significant renovations this coming year, so on your next stay you will hopefully be pleasantly impressed.

Summary Heading: Not friendly greeting at  evening check-in.  He must have had a bad day.
Summary: Nice place., clean, parking free, easy t find, but check  in front desk person was not friendly. No smile or friendly greeting at check in. Okay place to stay for one nite.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a helpful review. My sincerest apologies for the negative interaction with our agent, please know that at the Ramada we teach our staff that customer service is our number one priority. If you decide to stay with us again, you will see a significant difference.

Summary: We booked online and upon arrival were bumped up to the suite due to standard rooms being unavailable. It was clean and comfortable with enough space to move around freely. Great stay for an awesome price
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words and for choosing the Ramada as your place to stay. We pride ourselves in always providing excellent service, I am glad to hear you enjoyed your upgrade and look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Thought a continental breakfast was included but not. Room...
Summary: Thought a continental breakfast was included but not. Room was clean. Neighbors loud late into evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time and for choosing the Ramada. Unfortunately we do not include a continental breakfast, but our hotel has a separate restaurant that serves breakfast and lunch at additional cost to anyone who would like it. Our management team is also walking down the halls to assure noise is kept to a minimum, I will personally make sure to redouble our efforts to calm all noise issues before they arise. We look forward to your next stay, and exceeding your expectations.

Summary Heading: Not a place that i would recommend
Summary: The room was inadequate...There were marks on the furniture. The Baseboard was peeled off and half way on the floor.  The room had a very bad smell. In the morning the Housekeepers were outside literally yelling back and forth to each other in Spanish at 8am right outside our window.
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service and product we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment and revisit the meaning of "hospitality" with the staff. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: Staff friendly, rooms clean. But hotel very noisy. Watertap used by neighbours caused an incredible noise. Rooms very noisy. Internetconnection very poor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your helpful review. I am glad our staff and guest room was to your liking. Our sincerest apologies, our maintenance staff works from room to room to make sure the guests experience is always up to their standards. We are working on upgrading our internet connection and expect it to be ready for the new year. On your next stay I am sure we will exceed your expectations.

Summary: If you're visiting southern California and you want a nice place to stay, this is it!!!!  This Ramada is very easy to find.  It's right off the freeway (55) on the main street which i believe is Newport Blvd.  this Ramada is very clean.  the staff is friendly and the price is incredible!  There is even a KKL (Kim Kardashian look alike) that works there.  The hotel is very close to the Newport Beach pier, boardwalk and beaches.  And dont miss Balboa Island and the shopping there, about 2 miles south of Newport.  This hotel is close to shopping and restaurants also.   Its a great, clean, friendly place to stay.  I have stayed there twice now and would definately stay there again.  PS, nice pool also
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay. We will be happy to welcome you back if you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Family Reunion in Newport Beach, CA.
Summary: Our late check in was fast and the clerk was very efficient and professional.  This was our first time to stay in a Ramada Inn and we found our room to be very clean and charming.  We were very happy and satisfied with our stay and are relieved to know that we have a room that is just 2 miles from our relatives whenever we need to visit them again.
Manager Response: Your kind words are as much appreciated as your patronage. It is always a pleasure to have such wonderful guests such as yourselves, we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: love the staff,great rates,clean room,got upgraded for no more cost.Will be my go to Hotel when in Costa mesa
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your time and your kind words. Here at the Ramada we pride ourselves on selling an excellent product with memorable customer service. We look forward to welcoming you back, remember to remind us you are a returning guest for a nice discount for your loyalty.

Summary: I have been staying at the Ramada Costa Mesa/Newport Beach for over 30 years now! We like staying at the Ramada because its near the beach. Also other places to eat and movies.. I still have my invoices when I have stayed at the Ramada from day one.. The staff is great and helpful always! Especially Galvin! He is the best employee!! Thank you Ramada Costa Mesa/Newport Beach!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an informative and amazing review. I am sure I speak on behalf of Gavin, and the entire staff, when I say it's always a pleasure to have you stay with us.

Summary: Room and property clean but needs refrigerator. One of the guest thought my room was his and tried to get in. Then kept coming back trying to get me to go  for a drink with him. A llittle after 3:00am awoken by pounding and yelling outside of downstairs room. Apparently person  in room didn't want him there so locked him out. Yelling, pounding and screaming went on for 15 to 20 minutes. People in room next to me then had tv on most of night loud, I believe to drown the pounding downstairs out. About 9am to 11am alarm in next door bedroom continuously went off. I assume those people had already checked out.
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the unfortunate experience you had at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. Our first priority is the health and safety of our guests. We have management walk the property every hour or so to assure all is well. All of our rooms do contain mini fridges, and the suites also contain microwaves in them. Although I cannot change what happened, I do hope you will consider us in the future.

Summary Heading: Leaky toilets, stopped up sinks. People knocking on doors...
Summary: Leaky toilets, stopped up sinks. People knocking on doors at all hours of the night. Old and worn down
Manager Response: Let me apologize for any inconvenience that occurred during your recent stay. Maintenance is working consistently on correcting problems before a guest encounters them, and our management staff walks the property at all hours of the day to insure noise complaints and safety for all guests. Our main priority is for our guests to have a positive experience. On your next visit, I'm confident you will see a difference.

Summary: Comfortable Room & King Bed...helpful staff.  We were only there for one night & had a good breakfast in the on site restaurant.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and our wonderful restaurant. We will be happy to welcome you back if you return to the area. Next time I am confident we will exceed your expectations with the new items recently added onto our restaurant menu.

Summary: Although the facilities and location were great, on two separate visits, one week apart, we were awakened at around 2:00 am by loud arguing, cursing, and physical altercations in the rooms next to ours. When we left on the last morning of our latest stay (November 10), the window of the room next door was broken and the police were standing outside. We realize that the motel may not be able to fully control these kinds of events, but when we mentioned these disturbances at the time of our check-out, the staff seemed to take our concerns very lightly. We strongly suggested that more security needs to be provided. We will probably not stay here again
Manager Response: We are very sorry for the unfortunate experience you had at our hotel and appreciate your feedback. Our first priority is the health and safety of our guests. We have management walk the property every hour or so to assure all is well. I do hope you will consider us in the future.

Summary Heading: Close to Surgery Center Hoag Hospital NB
Summary: My daughter was having a surgery and I had to be there the next morning at 6:30am. I live 30 miles away, and it's a traffic nightmare, so staying close would save me going home and coming back early the next morning. I found the Ramada and I got a great rate with the Auto Club. The room was nice. #312, though right at the top of the staircase, so noise with roller-bags could disturb one. Two Queen beds, comfy. Tons of pillows. The only complaint I have, is that the lighting in the bathroom was way too dim and I did not have enough light to remove/put on make-up. Parking was ok. The front desk clerk was very friendly. Easy to check-in. The free wi-fi was easy to use...no password required.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving an honest and informative review. Our hotel staff will be thrilled to hear about your pleasant stay. I must also apologize for the inconvenience the dimness from the vanity lighting might have caused. Our maintenance staff is constantly doing preventative maintenance in rooms to assure that issues like the one you had do not happen. Although I cannot change what's happened, I have brought this up with our staff to assure it is a thing of the past. On your next stay I am confident we will meet your standards.

Summary: there was only one packet of coffee, no extra towels, but the location is nice. operator just rang and rang, never answering multiple times
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not keep with the spirit of service we provide on a regular basis. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: This hotel is shaped like a letter "C". Two elevators on both ends. My room is located at the middle so you have to take the stairs. It ain't bad. Staff are courteous and rooms are clean.  Restaurant/Bar in the vicinity, no free breakfast. Location is good, lots of restaurants around and liqour store within 2 mile radius. Easy driving in and out. Lots of parking. Pool is in the middle of the parking lot where vending and ice machines are also located. 2 miles from Newport Beach pier and Balboa Peninsula. Easy access to the highway. Pet friendly rooms are also available for a minimal fee. Slept comfortably even though there were 2 bus loads of school band kids when we stayed but I was on the top floor so I don't know the experience if you are staying at lower floors. Overall,
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your positive and very helpful review. If you had an concerns about noise issues, our management team is very good on doing hourly walks to insure every guest has a peaceful nights sleep, whether it be on the 1st or 3rd floor. Thank you again for your time, we look forward to welcoming you back to our property.

Summary: Clean rooms and friendly staff. we have stayed here 3 times and are always happy with this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your awesome review. Our hotel employees take great pride in what they do, this is reflected upon their great work and your satisfaction. We always look forward to welcoming you back to our property.

Summary: Great location to beach and restaurant, clean room but no breakfast was little disappointment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your honest and helpful review. We here at the Ramada pride ourselves in providing excellent customer service and a clean room for our guests to comfortably stay in. Our restaurant does provide warm breakfast in the mornings from 6:30AM - 11AM, albeit at a cost. I apologize for any inconvenience, and hope to welcome you back to our property soon.

Summary: It was an ok place to stay, not too bad for the money.  Kind of a sketchy neighborhood, but the parking is walled off, well lighted, seems pretty well monitored.  The first night was quiet, second night we had a party crown above us who played music and stomped around half the night, the next morning they had thrown cigarette butts all over the place off the balcony above us, littering the walks in front of our door.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. Our housemen staff is constantly walking the property making sure it is clean and accommodating for all of our guests. I will personally make sure their efforts are redoubled to assure these issues are a thing of the past. Upon your return, I am confident you will have a more pleasant stay.

Summary: Terrible dirty! I called to tell them couch was old, dirty and ripped , no one bothered to call me back !! I asked assistant if he relayed message (Ross ) he said it would be repaired AFTER we left!!!' Will never stAy there again. Disgusting everything oh my!!
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. Our property is constantly being renovated small portions at a time, unfortunately we might have not gotten to that room before your arrival. Please know that your business is important to us, and we as managers on property do our absolute best to amend any issues had. Given a chance in the future, I'm sure you will feel differently. Thank you so much for the feedback.

Summary: Before staying at this place I read nearly all reviews on here. I was a bit nervous to stay here but I did. I didn't experience anything negative whatsoever and I stayed for 11 days......The front desk staff were always helpful & friendly. Housekeeping did a good job cleaning my room and I never ran out of clean towels. My air conditioner worked okay & was not too noisy at all. I did stay on the top floor (was asked upon check-in for my preference) so I didn't have any issues with noise from others. I didn't have a vehicle on this trip but there did seem to be plenty of parking available. I ate at the restaurant twice & found it to be quite good but a bit on the pricy side. To sum up this review, this certainly isn't a 5-star hotel but I found it to be clean, safe & comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest and positive review. We at the Ramada strive to provide the very best overall service to 'Wow' all of our guests. Although I cannot change the past, I confident that your next stay will be a 5 star stay.

Summary: When we arrived the front desk person was very nice after that, I was a bit discouraged. We arrived on 10/8 thru 10/11 the room we were sent to was very dark and in the corner. Once we turned on the AC it would not cool the room, so we waited a few minutes and it still it would not work. I called downstairs and she said that the hotel was sold out and we cannot move room until the morning, normally in situations like this someone gets bumped or relocated to another hotel, we were not even offered a fan or something that would help. So we continued with our plans and not let this AC situation affect out family trip. We toughed it out, it was so hot in our room my son and my wife were very upset, we even went outside at 3am too cool down! I went downstairs and brought up the issue
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your experience. This is not acceptable and does not reflect the service we provide on a regular basis. Be assured we will use this as a teaching moment and revisit the meaning of Hospitality with our staff, and redouble our efforts with our preventative maintenance to insure that this does not happen again. Please know that your business is important to us and that we take it very seriously that we did not aid in every way possible.

Summary: The staff is very friendly, the rooms were clean and comfortable. The location was great, a few minutes from the beach and near many great restaurants.The hotel pool was clean and well maintained. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your honest review about us. We take pride in providing excellent customer service from the moment you walk in the door. Our housekeeping and maintenance staff work diligently to insure that everything on property is well maintained and clean. We look forward to welcoming you back to our property.

Summary Heading: $50.00 an hour! Yes, I said $50.00 and hour! And they CENSOR internet
Summary: If this review were based solely on the rooms I would give them 2 stars, but how can you not talk about bad service? I like many business travelers received a last minute call with a schedule change that required I extend my stay a day. I called the front desk to try and extend my stay by a day and they informed me that they were sold out, now I certainly have to admit that calling an hour before check out may not have been the best way to proceed but it was out of my control. I asked them if they would give me a little extra time for check out, mostly because I did not want to be out on the street without having made other hotel arrangements, all I wanted was an hour. I was told that they could extend the check out time at $50.00 an hour! I had been staying there for 2 nights
Manager Response: I am so sorry to hear of your negative experience. The reason we charge for late check-out is to discourage this action, with it implemented we can make sure we have plenty of rooms available at our check-in time of 3PM. As for the internet, us being a family friendly hotel, we go to great measures to assure that children can surf the internet with the parents having the piece of mind knowing they cannot go into inappropriate websites. I do apologize for any inconveniences our policies may have caused.

Summary Heading: Only two negatives. Internet was slow or unreliable. Room...
Summary: Only two negatives. Internet was slow or unreliable. Room several doors down had ordered room service and soup bowl was left outside on the air conditioning unit for the two days I was there.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. My sincerest apologies that those plates were not picked up. I will be sure to personally see that it does not happen in the future. Other than that, we are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Overpriced for the quality of this MOTEL. Close to everything, but sketchy neighborhood. Bed was comfy enough, but air conditioning hardy worked. Bathroom and the furnishings were dingy as was the exterior. I guess we were expecting more. As for the staff, the front desk attendant couldn't even find our reservation so we had to pull it up for her ourselves and provide the confirmation # to her, and the attendant the next day was plain rude to my husband. Won't be returning, and in the future we'd rather pay a bit more or stay farther in from the coast for a more updated establishment.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. I do hope you will consider us in the future as this experience was not representative of the outstanding experiences we provide regularly.

Summary: We were in town for a wedding and chose this hotel for our stay.  The gentleman at the desk was very nice and even got us in our room early.  He was helpful with some questions we had about the area.  We needed to use the computer to print boarding passes and he was also very helpful with that.  The Internet was not the greatest and the pool was a little cold, but big picture it was a great price for a beautiful area.  The mattresses were very comfortable and housekeeping did a good job.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and our wonderful restaurant. We will be happy to welcome you back if you return to the area.

Summary Heading: I have stay here many times.  It has gotten better. The...
Summary: I have stay here many times.  It has gotten better. The last two times the rooms were not very welcoming.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay. We have recently changed all of the mattresses in the hotel, and do a deep cleaning of our rooms on a weekly bases. Next time you can expect an even more pleasant stay.

Summary: All very good,however shocked at not even a cup of free complimentary coffee in the am. Well below Wyndham courtesy
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. My sincerest apologies that our coffee served in the restaurant was not free. But our rooms are fitted with a coffee machine with complementary decaf and regular coffee. Other than that, we are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The room was clean but the air conditioner growled all night and woke me every time it came on. Also for the price it would seem they could afford some decent pillows.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We will use your feedback to help guide our training efforts. I do hope you will consider us in the future as this experience was not representative of the outstanding experiences we provide regularly.

Summary: WE needed a room for a wedding in Newport beach. Ross the mgr on duty was very nice and pleasant. We got there a little early and he was kind enough to get us into our room a little early which worked out great for us. He also explained the hov lane (we missed the sign) so we knew where to go to pay for using it. All the ladies we encountered on our stay were very nice and pleasant as the laundry room was by the elevator so we saw a few and spoke to them. He also explained the shuttle would be there for us to use so we got to the wedding in plenty of time.
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting your review. I am sure the readers will find the information useful when deciding on a place to stay in Costa Mesa. We are also very glad you took the time to recognize our leader Ross, and the work he does to provide exceptional service to all of our guests. I'm sure I speak for him as well when I say it was pleasure having you here, and look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: i think this hotel needs updating especially the air conditioner system, very very hot in room, old window style in living room area only, didnt cool in bedroom, ceiling fan didnt do any good. Musty smell
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us feedback. I am very sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. I do hope you will consider us in the future as this experience was not representative of the outstanding experiences we provide regularly.

Summary: The room was comfortable and quite and the location was excellent for my purpose.  I was very pleasantly surprised by the restaurant and recommend you have the excellent soup.  The breakfast burrito is more than enough for two!
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay and our wonderful restaurant.  We will be happy to welcome you back if you return to the area.

Summary: Overall the appearance of the hotel was nice and right around the corner from the wedding on the boat. Our only complaint was that it was extremely hot in the room. The main room was in the back and the air did reach the back room and my husband and I ended up sleeping in the front room on the sofa bed which was not comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and submitting your review. Let me apologize for any inconvenience that occurred during your recent stay. Maintenance is working consistently on correcting problems before a guest encounters them, we want all our guests to have a positive experience. On your next visit, you will see a difference

Summary: After booking a room at this hotel I checked the reviews on trip advisor and another website.  I was horrified at what I had done!  The reviews I had read, on both sites, were terrible.  On the way to our hotel I was apologizing, in advance, to my wife.  I was fully expecting a miserable experience.  While checking in, Raul was very pleasant.  We were given a 2nd floor room (232).  Walked in to find a clean, spacious room with 2 queen beds.  It was a standard 3 star room.  The beds were comfortable.  The air conditioner worked well.  We always place the do not disturb sign on our door and were left alone.  Some reviews talked about parties of drunks all night, but we didn't have that problem.   I would stay here again.  The high rating is for the quality of the stay for a 3 star
Manager Response: Thank you for submitting your review. I am sure the readers will find the information useful when deciding on a place to stay in Costa Mesa. We look forward to seeing you again

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at your hotel.  The staff was very accommodating and helpful and our room/beds were very very comfortable.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you enjoyed your stay. We will be happy to welcome you back if you return to the area.

Summary Heading: Problems with keys, & older, below average property
Summary: This hotel is a dive. Also, upon arrivial, I was told that the key machine was broken and I did not have a key for my room for 1.5 days.  Mgmt. took a lackadaisical attitude toward the room key problem, letting the guests suffer. Poor custormer service attitude.
