Manager Response: Dear Ms Vimanne,  Let me start by apologizing for your issues during your stay. The confusion over breakfast, many Ramada's serve a complimentary continental breakfast since we have a full service restaurant and lounge we do not offer it. The bedding is triple sheets with a throw blanket and we also offer the old style heavy blanket upon request.  Depending on the time Im assuming only one person at the front desk and cannot leave that area.   We hope to provide all our guests an exceptional hotel experience, I hope you give us another try to exceed your expectations

Summary: I booked two rooms at the Ramada for one night in February. We got a call from the desk clerk during the afternoon of our stay, asking if we were still going to be staying with them that night as they were all booked up. When we arrived, the clerk who checked us in was very friendly and helpful. In one room, some of the lights weren't working and in the other, we couldn't get the A/C to put out anything but semi-cool air. Ran it all night but it never  seemed to cool. Bed was comfortable although the pillows weren't that great. All in all, the room seemed to be clean even though it was obvious that this is an older property. Didn't really stay there long enough to learn too much else about the property or local community as we checked our early the next morning to catch a 7:00
Manager Response: Dear Mr Dave,  Thank you for your feedback from your recent stay with us.  We use this to improve our service and product as we hope to provide our guests an exceptional hotel experience. I apologize for a light not working this should not happen especially when every bulb was replaced  last month.  As for the a/c could you either email me Rm #  we inspect them regularly and all need to be functioning at optimal level  Thank you again for choosing Ramada Inn & Suites and hope to see you again on your next visit

Summary: The desk staff were helpful, the room was clean, the beds were super comfortable and the restaurant served great meals.  We parked right by our room and were not disturbed by any of the other hotel guests.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are so happy to know  that your stay with us is met all your expectations.. It is great to read that you enjoy our to restaurant.. I will share your review with my team.. Once more, thank you for posting your review. We look forward to having you visit with us again in the

Summary Heading: The outside appearance was much better than I expected. the...
Summary: The outside appearance was much better than I expected. the location is convenient but in an industrial area. The room was clean and comfortable. The bath room was well stocked but definitely needed some upgrading. It was worn and the grout was missing between most of the tiles in the shower.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your recent stay.  I am pleased you noticed our curb appeal we take great pride in the way the property looks and feels.  We continuously  strive to improve and welcome your comments positive or negative.  We look forward to your next visit

Summary: The staff were extremely friendly. The room was great with 2 queen size beds. The room was clean and had a refrigerator. This was a great stay
Manager Response: Dear 501 Gerald,   Hello, Thank you for your most recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Costa Mesa/ Newport Beach and for your kind feedback. We are thrilled that you had an excellent experience at our hotel. Please come visit us soon!  Remember all returning guests receive a loyalty discount

Summary Heading: Surf City Half Marathon hotel stay
Summary: Hotel was located near enough to get to the race shuttle parking service in a timely and relatively stress-free way. Room was very clean, staff was friendly. Outside noise was loud so I didn't sleep all that well, but who does before a race anyway?  Overall, good value. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Runnergirl,  Thank you for your recent feedback regarding the Ramada Inn & Suites. We wish all our guests a exceptional hotel experience.  By your kind words its sounds like we succeeded.   Hope you enjoyed the race and hope to see you again

Summary: Accommodations were adequate at best.  Room cleanliness and comfort were less than the best, expected more from Ramada.  Restaurant was pretty good in both food quality and service.  It kind of had the feel of a motel one might rent by the hour, if you know what I mean.
Manager Response: Dear Emoryj,  Thank you for your recent feedback regarding your stay.  Your comments worried me.  I would like to speak with you so I can understand and rectify how the hotel felt like that Please either call 949-645-2221 or email rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com

Summary: Clean property.  I was impressed with how well the grounds were kept.  We had a late check in, and left the next morning.  Booked thru Hotwire and we were given a handicapped room.  It is nice to have larger room, but a handicapped bathroom I could do without.
Manager Response: Dear bhillut,  What a nice review, thank you! TripAdvisor is all about guest satisfaction and we tend to rate highly with guest who want to get the most for their dollar, value cleanliness, appreciate genuine hospitality and have done their research.  The time you took to do this review is greatly appreciated by everyone here. I hope to meet you on your next visit  * Book Direct with Us - For the Best Service, Selection, and Value! *

Summary: They apply filters to their wi-fi that prevents certain websites from being accessed. I did appreciate their conservatively slanted censorship. I'm an adult and I can view whatever I want!
Manager Response: Dear Jonathon,  Thank you for your recent feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites. Due to the franchise agreement there are certain websites that would be blocked. We have just enhanced the speed and strength of the WiFi

Summary: Bedroom is nice and cozy. Beds are comfortable and towels are thick and nice. However, we stayed 2 nights and both days we don't have cleaned towels in the room. Had to ask the guy in the laundry room. Also, our keys didn't work. The bathroom floor still have hair from previous guest when we first checked in. Overall it is a nice hotel with family. Quiet and Cassandra at the front desk is very helpful and checked us in with a smile on her face. Would be a plus if hotel provides hot b'fast for family with young children. Saves us a trip from going to the restaurants in early morning. Wish wifi is faster.
Manager Response: Dear Softballmom28,  Thank you so much for your review! Our staff truly appreciates your kind words. We are dedicated to providing the best service possible and we're glad that we succeeded in doing this for you.  We appreciate your suggestion for breakfast included, we didn't do that but in the Sunset Grill we do provide a nice breakfast special..   We will see you on your next visit

Summary: Overall stay very good. Two rooms booked, very clean. Location was also very good, close to beach locations and amusement parks!
Manager Response: Dear 251Dennisa,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visits to Newport Beach. And for posting such a nice review. We strive to make our guests stay as comfortable as possible by offering free upgrades when available.   Our housekeepers are proud of their rooms and are happy to see your comments regarding this. It's nice to hear that our guests appreciate the amenities and service we extend to our valued guests.  Our mission is to provide  quality, affordability and great customer service to our guests.

Summary: We have been here several weeks. They have raised our rate several times without notice and then lied about the raate I was originally offered. We constantly have to beg for housekeeping. Maintenance took ten days and a dozen calls to fix one of the room phones.There have been numerous probs with their satellite provider and when Cassie answers you can bet she will notify nobody and at best send some gopher up to change the channels only to tell you it's their provider and do nothing about it.At night during weekdays, the Grill is very good. For breakfast, fair at best and sometimes downright uncaring and in denial. The furniture in the rooms can be disgusting. Make sure to grab extra blankets to cover them. Parking is a joke. They never enforce "no-smoking" and our room and the
Manager Response: Dear Rev,  Regarding rates they change often depending on how busy the hotel is.  If you book a room for 1 night you are guaranteed the rate signed for.  If you decide to stay the rate can change again depending on business, and by change could be lower or higher. I would like to offer my apology for any miscommunication or interpretation. I would be glad to speak with you about your stay. You can reach me at 949-645-2221

Summary: room was clean-bathroom was small, toilet was very close to wall-shower small and had an old shower head on it.  Stayed on 2nd floor suite-should have asked for the 3rd floor.  Could hear person above at 1:00 and 5:00 am-made complaint but did not help.  Was told they could move me but had to be back at hotel by noon to move my belongings, person was suppose to check out-do not understand why they could not move him since there was a complaint.  Lots of cigarette butts outside restaurant on ground and elevator smelled like smoke.   Otherwise staff was nice and room was overall clean.
Manager Response: Dear Denise P.  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We take all feedback seriously and if it will help improve the operation , and guest satisfaction we try to incorporate.   The cigarettes we have just designated to areas in the back and side of the property.  We are eliminating or working to stop all smoking in hallways and around other rooms Hopefully your next visit you will notice some other changes stronger and faster WiFi others to come

Summary Heading: Great area...average hotel. I'm not a fan of hotels...
Summary: Great area...average hotel. I'm not a fan of hotels arbitrarily charging a "safe fee". They will remove it at check out if you ask though.
Manager Response: Dear 894 Dalip,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback from your recent stay.  We take all comments with a positive outlook as its the only way to improve.

Summary: The rooms were spacious & clean and centrally located for our needs. Very close to restaurants, grocery shopping and more.  Oh, beds very, very comfortable!
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Costa Mesa/Newport Beach.  We try and wish all our guests experiences are exceeded by our service and commitment. I do agree with you our brand new beds are incredible.

Most of the rooms had the following maintenance issues: AC/Vent was not working,  All the bathroom vents were worn and real loud,  TV remote, phone and clock not working, Some lights not working and no available electrical outlets for laptops.  Everything in the bathrooms leaked all night,  Front door was
Manager Response: Dear Frank,  Let me apologize for your recent stay.   Would you please contact me directly so I can get more information. This would be helpful to me and I would like to speak with you. 949 - 645 - 2221

Summary: I made reservations online.  I was charged $126/ night for two rooms for two nights.  When I checked in other guests were paying $100/ night with no reservations, same rooms, same nights.  I asked the registration attendant about it and he said it was because I was getting "points" for booking in advance, online.  I told him I didn't want the points, rather I wanted the best rate I could get and thought I was getting that when I made the reservations online.  He said he couldn't do anything about it at that point!!!  Free WiFi access is advertised.  We were never able to get WiFi through our complete stay.  It would connect and immediately disconnect.  The morning we checked out I had an email that was very important to get out with attachments from my lap-top files. So I went
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was pretty much what I expected.  Front desk staff were very polite, friendly and accommodating.  I asked for a 2nd floor room but quickly switched to the 3rd floor when I discovered a family above me with an energetic child.  Wifi signal on the 3rd floor was non-existent, whereas I had a decent signal on the 2nd floor.  Washroom cleanliness was somewhat below par.  Towels were poorly folded making me question how clean they were.  Toilet could have been cleaner.  Nothing is more disgusting than a dirty toilet.  Overall, I would have given this a poorer rating but I was treated by the desk staff and they're hospitality was appreciated.  I probably would look elsewhere before booking here again.  It was reasonably close to the beach, compared to the Costa Mesa hotels
Manager Response: Good Mourning,  Thank you for your feedback from your recent stay.  As we have the highest of standards I was dismayed by what you detailed.  Would you please email me or call me so I can get specifics and investigate  Thank you

Summary: The staff at the front desk were very accommodating & friendly. Lovely tree in lobby. Impatiens -- I'm pretty sure real-- in window boxes. Happened to meet the owner in the elevator, very friendly. Housekeeping did an excellent job-- only complaint was they replaced all used towels not just ones on floor, as sign had instructed us to do, as is better for environment & CA water use.  Will definitely stay here again, especially since grandbaby (& parents) lives down the street!
Manager Response: Dear Elenor,  Thank you for your recent feedback regarding your stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  We try to exceed our guests expectations.   On your next visit please call me directly and you will receive a automatic  15% returning guest special  Thank you again

Summary: We were greeted by Gavin. He was polite and helpful throughout our stay. The room was clean and had excellent amenities. the lights were a bit confusing. some required wall switches in other rooms, some just used the lamp switch. Great location for our purposes. Many people hanging out outside during the night. most were polite when asked to stop the noise and went back to their rooms or off the property.
Manager Response: Dear Scott,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Costa Mesa / Newport Beach.  We definitely try to exceed all our guest expectations with service and value.   Remember on your next stay ask for returning guest discount.   Thank you again

Summary: Crystal, the Registration girl was very nice, but in the evening we went to your bar for an after diner drink and we feel the bartender was much to be desire! My husband forgot his prescription glasses on the table, we were the only customers at the bar, the next morning my husband went to look for them and the guy at the bar didn't even bother to look for them! Told him to go to the front desk  and check. Neither of them even made the attempt to look.... Also, checking our bank statements, (we had two rooms) and noticed a $10. Extra charge not showing on our invoices! The second room was under Steve Wells.
Manager Response: Dear G,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay.  I am really pleased that you were happy with the service of the front desk. I am sorry your glasses were not found.  If you would like to speak with me further please call 949-645-2221

Summary: We have a cat and fortunately the Ramada was very pet friendly.   We had an excellent dinner in the hotel restaurant.  We only stayed one night due to repairs at our home, but it was the next best thing to being home.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with tour feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites. We know you have many options where to stay and value you chose the Ramada Inn & Suites Costa Mesa / Newport Beach. Remember when returning to mention you previous stay you will receive  automatic discount for returning guest.

Summary: Located just off of Newport blvd, good location to visit Newport harbor, Balboa beach and peninsula. Not far from Fashion Island and South Coast Plaza malls. Just one complaint, we were unable to conect to the internet while in the hotel room and they were unable to resolve the problem. There is a computer available to guests in the loby if you wish to use it.
Manager Response: Dear Galen,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We always try to exceed our guests expectations.  I do apologize for the internet problem you encountered.  If you can contact me with your room # I can have that area checked. Thank you again for your feedback and remember on your next visit always ask for return guest automatic discount

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a family reunion weekend. The room was shabby and worn. My husband forgot to specify non-smoking and the room was quite stinky with old cigarette fumes. There were lots of butts laying around in the outside corridors and on the stairs. There was some confusion with the hotel being unwilling to honor the group rate that been previously negotiated, and the manager was downright rude to a family member. On the good side the hotel is very close to Coast Highway and Newport Blvd and so is a good location for just about anything you want to do in Newport.
Manager Response: Dear Liz,  I want to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We take great pride in the service we provide.  I would like to speak with you in detail regarding issues you encountered.  You can reach me at 949-645-2221 or rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com Thank you again looking forward to hearing from you

Summary: Very noisy neighbors, but calling front desk at 3 and 4 am did result in resolution during week.  Weekend guests had no consideration for others sleeping at 3 am.   Requested King room with reservation made 1 month prior and was informed at check in nothing available.  Hotel did upgrade us to a Suite at same price.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback from your recent stay.  The inconsiderate neighbors that is an issue we try to solve the moment we get a call.  Typically we give one warning next call we kick out.  We do upgrade customers from standard king to a king suite which the bedroom king size bed and separate living room which is what we did for you.

Summary: First time staying here because of no vacancy, now I know why.  No problems, easy check in, plenty of parking and room was comfortable.  The only hiccup would be the bath towels, one word, rough.  Close to freeway and beach.  We try and stay here again, at least once a month.
Manager Response: Dear Mr Daypak,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  On your next visit ask for me I always enjoy interacting with our guests

Front desk was no help with questions on room block list.  Bought appetizer platters for wedding after party which was out and eaten by other patrons in restaurant. Brought to anastasias attention and she said there was nothing she could do. Still upset someone else talked to her again and she ordered a few pizzas. I spent $200 on about $25 worth of pizza. Management seriously needs to be fired. There is no reason the customer should go in for a meeting and not be able to talk to a manager till 3 hours later. No phone calls returned. No care for anything after contracts are signed. Will never stay at this ramada or recommend it to
Manager Response: Dear Mike B.,  Let me apologize for any inconvenience at your after party or pre wedding arrangements.    On the evening of your after party there was another one as well going on with appetizer platters as well.  we placed on opposite sides on the restaurant and had name placards by the platters.  We even had separate bartenders for each party really trying to be proactive.  Unfortunately for you the efforts were not enough as the one party ate everything.  At that point Anastacia was speaking to the bride and from my understanding the bride said just get food.  We suggested chicken wings and pizza which she said was great.  I am sorry again for a missed or late meeting your right it should never happen.  I would like to speak with you in detail if you could contact me at 949-645-2221 or email rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com  Thank you and I hope to speak with you soon

Summary: Nice location, clean room, quiet, easy parking and nice staff wished there was a connection to charge cell USB?
Manager Response: Dear Sir,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Newport Beach/Costa Mesa.  We do try to provide excellent service along with great accommodations and it sounds like we succeeded.  Thank you for your business, until next time

Summary Heading: Nice hotel. Management needs to address some issues.
Summary: Hotel grounds were nice, clean and new looking. Room was clean and looked unused.  However, when we arrived the front desk attendant was short and abrasive. When we checked in the room had no towels. We requested them through the hotel phone, but none arrived. The tv remote did not work, and we could connect to the internet, but no actual service.  I probably would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Will,  Thank you for your feedback from your recent stay.  Let me apologize for the inconsistent service that is not what we demand. Will you please email rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com or call 949-645-2221 so I can get more details.  I need the information so I can address correct personnel.  Thank you in advance.

Summary: The room was fine, what you would expect.  The bed was nice and internet was alright.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  My only complaint would be the bathroom smelled like urine.  Not sure if it just wasn't cleaned will or problem with the toilet.
Manager Response: Dear Krebstar,  Thank your for your recent feedback from your stay.  I was pleased with your comments except for the urine smell in bathroom.  Let me apologize

Summary Heading: I love the hotel we stay there 5-6 times a year.  The price...
Summary: I love the hotel we stay there 5-6 times a year.  The price and the location are on target for my family.  Its a kid friendly hotel with everything we like to do very close by.
Manager Response: Dear Denise099,  Thank you so much for recent feedback from your stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  We try to be the best value with exceptional service in newport Beach/Costa Mesa area.  On your next visit call me directly and let me do something special.  Thank you again

Summary: I stay here at least twice a month,I call in advance,reserve a particular room for my needs,and conduct business, and return home. I reserved a room, arrived ,and was told my room was not available,nor was any room available to fit my needs at that time. Not very happy with the news,and time being short,I had to compromise , only to find out upon checking in someone had been smoking in the room recently ,the staff denied that, so I spent a sleepless night,in a room that did not satisfy my needs. I took pictures,of the cigarette butts aligned in the tree outside, informed the staff, returned home, not sure I will stay again! Nothing from the staff, no appoligy,nothing . I found out later, my reservation stated on it,do not move, can't figure out why I was move(805) 295-9153.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  I just got off the phone with you.  Thank you for you business after this unpleasant stay.  We value you as our guest and anytime ask for me if you need anything Ross Stibor

Summary: We stayed at the Ramada Costa Mesa for 10 nights.  There is a construction site across the street from our room that started at 7am.  We checked in on the weekend so it wasn't something we noticed.  The building is L shaped and there are not very many rooms on the construction side, you would assume they would try and avoid putting guests on that side. The toilet needed a new flapper (a 2 dollar, 2 minute fix), so it ran every 30 seconds.   On 3 of the nights, rowdy guests partied until well after midnight, with some foul mouthed fellow pounding on doors at 3am one morning.  This may not be the norm, but it happened during our stay. One day we would have 5 or so towels left for us, while only 1 was left on a couple of days.  The first night we stayed we had to clean a large
Manager Response: Dear Leeann,  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at the Ramada Inn.  Let me apologize your stay wasn't what you expected regarding noise.  We do have personel  24 hrs a day to handle noise or any situation on the property.  I unfortunately can't control the construction across the street.  I didn't realize it could be an issue this is the first time its been brought up.  Regardless I apologize Thank you for your business as I know you have many choices and hope to see you again  Regards,

Summary Heading: Convenient but needs a lot of work
Summary: The location is easily accessible to John Wayne Airport, Newport Bay and various stores and restaurants. The clerk was able to accommodate us with an early check-in due to our early arrival. We could check in and shower and change in time for the wedding to which we were attending. The manager was grumpy and non-responsive. The "10-minute" free shuttle from the airport took 40-minutes. The shuttle to the Bay for the wedding we had come for was cancelled, so we had to scramble to get transportation on time for the boat's departure. We found other accommodations for the second night in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Ncdavid,  We do offer shuttle service for weddings when a contract is signed and minimum 8 rooms are occupied.  The wedding in question actually had 2 rooms occupied through the block.  I do know one person booked way after the cut off day and another couple went through a 3rd party.  Even though the stipulations were not met, I offered for the shuttle to take a group when it was available.  I do appreciate your feedback thank you

Summary: Hotel is in a great location although it's a little hard to get into/out of with traffic. The staff was awesome. The pool and jacuzzi were nice. My only complaint would be that the carpet needs to be cleaned in the rooms as it turns your feet black.
Manager Response: Dear C Carr,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites. We are located convenient to beach, entertainment , shopping and any dining choice you wish Depending on the time traffic does zip by you always need to be aware. I do apologize as we clean carpets on a schedule and sometimes it needs to be done prior

Summary: We have stayed at this motel over the last 10 years with no problems this time we had several issues that have been addressed to the manager each issue was resolved but it interupted our stay in the first 3 days and we only stayed 4 nights. The manager issued a credit no where near what i felt we should have been compensated for all the problems we had.
Manager Response: Dear 686 Cathy,  Thank you for providing your  feedback from your recent stay at our hotel.  I am assuming we spoke as you mentioned I issued you a credit for your issues.   Sorry you felt it should have been more, I would just say I try to be fair.  As you said your a returning guest please on your next stay contact me directly and let me set it up.

Summary Heading: I had a room next to the maid area. They were very loud...
Summary: I had a room next to the maid area. They were very loud. Had to ask them to please keep it down. Always had a cart in front of my room.
Manager Response: Dear Claudia B,  I want to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites We take all comments seriously to enhance next guests experience. Summary Heading: Restricted Internet Use made this hotel a bad choice for me
Summary: a number of different online social networks that i check on a regular basis (especially while traveling) were blocked because they were deemed "unsafe" which is absolutely ridiculous. Then after i inquired with the front desk about the censoring of the internet I was faced with a clueless professional scratching his head and telling me, "Gee, I dunno anything about that". VERY DISAPPOINTING and a productivity KILLER!!
Manager Response: Dear Real J,  I am so sorry you had trouble with our internet service.  I will check with our provider about restricted sites.  I appreciate your feedback as we can fix or know what is happening online  Thank you again

Summary: I stayed here twice on business, and had an average stay both times.  The good: -if you book through the wyndham rewards website you can get a room for about $79 most nights, which is cheaper than most comparable hotels in the area. -Not too far from newport beach  The bad: -it's really a motel, not a hotel, which you can tell from the pictures. This means no walking around naked with the windows open because someone might walk right past your window. -Each time I stayed here it was pretty packed. Parking lot was over capacity, and it would get a bit noisy at night. -No free breakfast, not even coffee (besides what is provided in your room). -my first time here the room I had issues with one of the light switches.  Overall it was fine... you get what you pay for.  Nothing
Manager Response: Dear CircuitMonkey, Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay.  We try to provide best value in the Newport Beach/Costa Mesa area,  We do stay busy as you have seen and parking is a problem sometimes but we manage it well with our parking pass system.  Please remember returning guests automatically receive a 15% discount because of the loyalty you show

Summary Heading: The hotel experience was great room and facilities. The...
Summary: The hotel experience was great room and facilities. The carpet in the room needed to be steam cleaned. Feet got dirty from the shower to the suitcase. But besides that the stay was great!
Manager Response: Dear Styler,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  I m assuming you were here for Volcums skateboard competition by the name, you go by.  Thank you again for your feedback

Summary Heading: No many complaints in Costa Mesa
Summary: The room was spacious and clean, and I was lucky to get a room right across from the pool and I could always park right in front of the room window. The only negative had nothing to do with the hotel, but my fellow guests. Very rambunctious and noisy- with opening closing their doors throughout the night. It's a very good location. The beach is right down the street on Superior and the best restaurants are all within 7 minutes. Went to The Harp Inn and saw the greatest local band in my life: The Crimson Crowbar.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  It is always nice to hear nice comments when you try so hard to please everybody.  Thank you again and when you come back introduce yourself and remember returning guests get automatic 15% discount off rate of the day

Summary: The gentleman at the front desk, upon our arrival, was less than cordial.   During our stay, whenever approached with a question, he always seemed to be grumpy and appeared to be less than enthusiastic about assisting us guests.  When entering our room, there was an extremely strong smell of cleaning products.  It took some time to get used to the strong fumes.  There was a skateboard competition going on during our stay and it appeared the restaurant staff was overwhelmed.  One waitress even told us that with all the skateboarder groups, we simply would have to wait.  The internet service is extremely slow here; to the point where it's not even worth it.  The location is great and close to many restaurants.  The pool area was very nice and well-kept.  I'm on the fence as to
Manager Response: Dear Paula,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn and Suites.I would love you to give it another chance as we take pride in the service we provide.  If you would call me direct I would personally make sure you have a stay to remember Ross Stibor 949-645-2221 or email rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com

Summary: As a world traveler I was appalled at the state of this white trash hotel near the beach.  If you like toilet seats that fall right off the toilet, absolutely nowhere to park in the lot any night after 10pm, cleaning staff that bang on your door at 8am, and do not stop coming back, hundreds, yes HUNDREDS of drinking people in the parking lot. People sitting outside their rooms getting high at all hours and tons of noise, filthy carpets, showers that run hot and cold continually, spotty at best wireless internet, then this is your dream hotel. Staff are rude, and could care less. This hotel should be condemned with all of its staff, its a bad 80's leftover that serves a beach community that is just one big bad party. DO NOT STAY HERE, Motel 6 looks better, and i never thought I
Manager Response: Dear Mr Wild Echo,  Thank you so much for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  I do apologize for any inconvenience or perceived lack of care regarding our room or guests. Just FYI one of our big clients held a skateboard competition during your stay that was kids skating in parking lot.  After 10pm we do shut it down just like the pool. Thank you again for your feedback

Summary Heading: So bad, we left a day early!
Summary: Room's air conditioning didn't work!  The room smelled like dirty socks.  It was also located on the ground floor next to the laundry facility, as well as the stair well...VERY noisy!   Best part was the breakfast, good food, and good table service!    We had booked two nights, but ended up leaving after the first night!  Overall, never again.  Upgrade to something better, it will be worth it?
Manager Response: Dear Irene,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to provide us feedback on your recent stay. I was happy to hear you enjoyed the Sunset Grill.  I want to apologize for not meeting your expectations . Feel free to give me a call and let me provide a stay that will exceed your expectations

Summary: The beds are totally squishy - no support. Housekeeping was all over the place with piles of laundry
Manager Response: Dear Karen B,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  I would like to ask you to either call or email me rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com or 949-645-2221 and give me room #, as we have replaced 75% of beds in las year.   As for housekeeping we have a spread out property and they are constantly retrieving linen and terry to wash and provide for guests.  I apologize if this was a inconvenience

Summary: My husband and I stayed in the Ramada, Costa Mesa at Newport Beach for 4 nights in Sept, wish we could have stayed longer! We loved everything about it. Friendly staff, especially at breakfast. Loved the room, very big and spacious, lovely comfy bed. Great bathroom and dressing room. Great laundry room, right next to the lovely pool area, good excuse for a dip whilst waiting for your laundry. Loved loved loved this motel. Excellent value for money.
Manager Response: Dear Craig,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  It is our pleasure to have guests that enjoy the property as much as you did. On your next visit stop by say hello  Thank you again

Summary: Overall the room was clean and comfortable.  The only complaint I have is that housekeeping knocked on our door at 7:30am in the morning.  Then knocked again at 8:45am. Then called the room at around 11:45am.  I felt like I did not sleep well due to the interuptins.
Manager Response: Hi Jram,  Thank you for the feedback from your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Newport Beach/Costa Mesa.  I am a little perplexed by your comment of houskeeping knocking on your door so early in the mourning.  Housekeeping stats at 9am so am confused.  Apologize for any inconvience  Hope to see you again

Summary: We got a free upgrade on arrival which was great but the rooms are very basic. Basic I can deal with but the rooms were dark with very few lights so it felt dingy!   Staff are friendly and rooms are clean! Met all our needs but certainly no frills!   If you want to be close to the beach I would recommend booking somewhere in Newport itself.
Manager Response: Hi Kelly J,  Thank you for your recent feedback regarding your stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  We try to be the best value option in the Newport Beach / Costa Mesa area.   Im sorry you felt room was not bright enough and didnt give you that feeling.

Summary: Overall hotel was nice for the rate.  Unsure why the only ice machine was across the parking lot by the pool. When your on the third floor its not very convenient.  Also, was surprised breakfast was not included, and over-priced. Other than that I was content. PS. I was very shocked that when trying to watch Sunday Football for a couple hours before checkout,  I found out that the channels (FOX and CBS) were not provided.  Even though the channel listing in the room listed them. Only incident that really irritated me...
Manager Response: Dear Mr Justin,  Thank you for providing us feedback from your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites.  We try to provide the best value in Newport Beach/Costa Mesa area.  I was a little confused about the comment regarding TV channels we offer both CBS and FOX being a huge football fan I would never stay where you couldn't watch a game.  Thank you again for your feedback

Summary: Overall a nice stay.  Reserved a room with a King bed, but was informed this was unable and due to reserving thru Orbitz the hotel could not accommodate but did give us 2 queens.  Would like to see enough parking for all guests to park safely.
Manager Response: Dear Susan F,  Thank you for your positive feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Newport Beach/ Costa Mesa.  On your next visit please call me direct as we always will provide the lowest rate possible. Thank you again for your positive feedback

Summary: Staff very nice and helpful but property not as clean as it should be.  Ants in the room and less than desirable people in the parking lot all hours of the day and night.  Environmental staff very "social" and I am sure had a lot of stories, pictures and other information to share with each other on their phones.. Stayed here on business because of close location to major medical facility.  Will look for other options when I return in six weeks
Manager Response: Dear Ms Cynthia,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.I apologize for ants, we do have a professional outside exterminating company who sprays and take care of property.  I see you have a trip planned soon, call me direct would be happy to upgrade.  I can be reached at 949-645-2221 or email me rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com

Summary: I asked for a wake up call and didn't get one. Missed my appointment. Will never use this ramada again!  I have been let down by the management also. They have not gotten back to me . The room was also extremely run down.

Summary: I usually avoid Ramadas as the brand has very inconsistent quality control, but snagged this one on Priceline (opaque bidding) for half the rack rate.  Stayed in a 3rd floor room here and it was clean, well appointed and spacious.  Check-in was efficient, and the front desk clerk even asked me which floor I preferred.  No issues with dirty/wet carpet, bed bugs, or noise outside the room as others have reported recently.  Priceline rates this hotel as a 2-star; I'd give it 2.5 stars.
Manager Response: Dear Rory F,  Than you for providing feedback from your recent stay at the Ramada Inn & Suites Newport Beach/Costa Mesa.  Next time you come to the area please contact me direct as we will always provide lowest rate GTD. Thank you again for the positive feedback

Summary: I stayed here with two friends in August for 3 nights. They give you a parking permit when you check in but they don't regulate parking at all. When I asked the night front desk staff where to park because people were parking in front of other cars, red zones, and fire hydrants, he yelled at me "well what do you want me to do about it?" I again explained that I just wanted to know where I am supposed to park and he again yelled at me that theres nothing he can do and if I "want to complain then go ahead." People at the hotel were having parties where others who weren't staying there were coming and using all the parking. The towels were dingy and rough from being washed so much, and they don't give you enough for the amount of people you have in the room. The "gym" was tiny with
Manager Response: Dear Katy,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay  I would like to discuss specifics with you if you could contact me at 949-645-2221 or rstibor@ramadasuitesnewport.com  Thank you

Summary: I stayed here for two nights and I was pleasantly surprised.  The hotel was very clean, and the comfort of the bed made me not want to get up in the morning.  The front desk personnel were helpful and friendly. The refrigerator, microwave, and other amenities such as coffee were very welcome.  The only problem is that the Wi-Fi was spotty. But I had very little time to fiddle around with the computer.  And the TV had plenty of channels.  Sofa and chairs to sit on and it table was a nice addition as well.  Lots of places to eat nearby.  Very pleased with my stay here.

Summary: I love this property! The quaintness of the exterior represents the hospitality you receive from the time you walk in to the lobby until the time you check out. The staff is personable and accommodating. And their bar and restaurant is the best kept secret in Orange county!

The vending machine in the parking lot was broken, so I went to the bar to get a $3 Diet Coke, but the CO2 machine was broken in the bar, so Diet Coke was unavailable. UGH!!!  Wi-fi was constantly in and out.  The day we left, the hotel was receiving new

Summary: This is a motor-lodge type motel with all doors opening toward the parking lot. Vending and ice machines are in the middle of the parking lot by the pool. The property is old but maintained. Renovations have been done but in a piecemeal fashion. Some things in the room are new while others are old. Even the new furnishings and decorations are of an outdated style as not to clash with the old things that weren't replaced. Though there is a restaurant on-site, I went in to get dinner and found the dining room empty of either customers or staff and walked out after a few minutes. The noise level is high as you can hear every foot step and door closing of any room in the vicinity and the plumbing howls in the walls. It's not a bad place but definitely over-priced for what it is.
Manager Response: Dear CgarlesC,  Thank you for providing your recent feedback regarding your  stay.  Im sorry you feel we didnt provide value as we price ourselves lower then competitive set.  We offer more amenities. I was really dismayed by your trip into restaurant, I apologize for that.

We ended up going to the front desk and arguing with the manager before they finally

There were times when it would get a little noisy but that is to be expected at a pool at 3pm no matter where you are. Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was very close to everywhere. Restaurants were within walking distance. Great value for our short stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice and convenient to restaurants and beach
Summary: Big hotel, large rooms, older TVs. Clean and comfy. No free breakfast but restaurant on premises offering discount for guests.  Many restaurants within walking distance, as well as grocery stores and other shopping. A few minutes drive to beach, boardwalk, piers of Balboa and Newport Beach.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was not given a handicap accessible room despite ordering one online.  I was told by the manager that because I booked the room online through Ramada.com, they don't necessarily have to honor that request.  After several phone calls to management, they finally moved us to a handicap accessible room.  The lip of the door was so high that the wheels on my wheelchair got stuck.  The elevator at the hotel was broken.  This was such a terrible experience that I will never stay at another Ramada anywhere and will never recommend anyone else do so either.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Reserved 17 rooms for 50th anniv party aboard Electra. Ramada provided a special room rate, transportation to ship and buffet breakfast for 40 the next morning. Everything was perfect. Great staff, clean comfy rooms yummy food. The staff far exceeded our expectations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: came here with a group to watch the Newport boat parade for christmas.  We had a nice rate and upgraded to a suite.   Rooms were nice, although lighting and finding switches was sometimes complicated.  Bathroom too dark.  Otherwise nice place to stay, lots of markets, Outback in walking distance.   Excellent produce store right next store
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff at the Ramada were just wonderful and very helpful. The only complaint I could have is that we got a room to close to the maids quarters and they would start pushing their carts early in the morning and it was a little too noisy.  Other than that it was clean, nice and comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay. Very clean.  Staff very friendly and helpful. Close to our family.  Many good restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: we were happy with our stay, had our small dog with us and...
Summary: we were happy with our stay, had our small dog with us and its a great place to stay with pets , very pet friendly and lots of grass area to take them close to the rooms.  Decent place , for the price, very clean inside and out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: I got a really good rate on this hotel from booking.com, and compared to other local hotels it was a deal -- but I would say this is more like a MOTEL than a HOTEL.  The walls are paper thin.  The freeway is right there and reflects noise into the room at all hours.  The toilet was running.  Guests stood out on the balconies all night and spoke loudly on their cell phones, and smoked.  A car parked in the parking lot at about 11 pm with hip hop music blasting.  Someone knocked loudly on our door at about 10:30 or 11:00 pm.    If you DO want a cheap place to stay, just bring some earplugs.  At least it was clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here off and on for 16 years.  Always satisfied. Excellent staff especially housekeeping. Rooms recently got new linen. Much better!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bait and switch prices. Stinky rooms ~ Beware!!!
Summary: The rooms stink like smoke. The guy in the next room smoked cigs and had to smoke them, out side my room door every 15 min.  The smoke stink came in my window and under the door as it leaked air under it. Then the hotel over charged me over 30.00 extra on my bank statement! I got hung up on from the customer service when I asked for help. I went online and found corp. I called and spoke  to Chris in corp. and he said and I quote I will call them and you should hear from them in about a week? I wanted to have lunch the next day and was told it was closed for the employees to have a ham dinner, only. It was thanksgiving day. I will NEVER stay at a Ramada again!!! They STINK!!!

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for - sometimes....
Summary: Where to start. This hotel was on the list of hotels we could choose from for Surf City Softball tournaments. Part of the reason our team chose this hotel was the price and the free breakfast.   Upon check in, we were told they are not doing free breakfast any longer. You can get a $3.99 breakfast which includes items that are $4.25...basically you save 26 cents LOL. You can not apply the $3.99 as a credit towards other food. If you are promised free breakfast when you make your reservation, then that should be grandfathered in.  The waitress in the restaurant felt very badly about this and was totally overwhelmed with about 15 tables and little assistance. Management should not put a server in that position.  Beds were okay. The pillows not so much. Little fridge in the room
Manager Response: none

I understand the importance of a pest free property and take precaution to ensure that for our hotel. I am proud to say that we contract experts for preventive pest control on a weekly basis, for the property exterior and guestroom interiors. In the rare times we are informed that there is a pest problem, our standard procedure is to summon these experts to verify the presence of pests, and take the necessary measures to remove them immediately. In the case of this reviewer, these experts were unable to find any signs of pest activity. Despite this, I am glad that Alvetta was able to comfort the reviewer in the manner requested of us.  Our management team conducts regular walk-throughs of the property to proactively resolve issues such as noise and public consumption of alcohol. In the case where a guest alerts us to a problem occurring between these walk-throughs, our management team responds immediately to resolve the situation. While we cannot directly control the behavior of other guests, we do have the option to have such guests vacate the area. I feel that our staff handled the situation by the book, and resolved disruptions described by the reviewer within minutes. And beyond the expidited resolution of the disturbance, I was pleased that our staff was able to settle the reviewer‚Äôs lodging expenses in the manner requested of us.  On the general subject of refusing service; It would be irresponsible of me to subject my staff to an excessive degree of vulgarity and insult from any guest, long term or otherwise.  Turning away future business from a guest is a difficult decision, but is not impacted whatsoever by a guest's voiced opinion. We encourage all of our guests to let us know about their stay so we can resolve any matters on-site. We also appreciate when our guests share their experience with other travelers, and would never impede on that right. Even a negative review can help realign our focus to do better. Unfortunately in this case, I cannot agree with the circumstances described in the review.

Summary: This is your run-of-the-mill motor inn. Nothing special - but the rooms are clean and comfortable, the pool area is quite nice, and the free breakfast is adequate. There are conveniences within easy walking distance (grocery store, Starbucks, shopping), and the beach is a short drive away. I would not use this as a home base for a trip to Disneyland (it's a pretty long drive), but if you are interested in being close to the beaches and immersing yourself in the Southern California culture, this is a good place to stay.

Summary: This was truly one of the best hotels I have stayed at for this price (79.00).  Check in was quick and painless and the staff was great.  They helped us with finding a great place to eat, very knowlegable about the area and earger to help.  The entire property was well kept and very clean.  The room was very clean no smells, stains, or problems at all.  Everything worked and did not look worn out or abused.  The property is within a short drive to Newport Beach and its pier and Hwy one with tons of great shops and places to eat.  The property has its back to Newport Blvd. but I never could tell a busy street was there.  We had two rooms for one night and would stay there again.  I recommend this hotel to anyone.
